title: Allianz PNB Life — International Health Claim Form (IHP)

fields.label: Policy No.
fields.summary: Write policy number exactly as on your policy.

fields.label: Full Name (Last, First, Middle)
fields.summary: Write full name of the insured.

fields.label: Nature of the Accident
fields.summary: Tick one: • Work Accident • Road Accident • Others.

fields.label: Cause and Details of Accident
fields.summary: Describe how the accident happened (brief but specific).

fields.label: Diagnosis of the Attending Physician (Accident)
fields.summary: Write physician’s diagnosis related to the accident.

fields.label: Prescribed Medicines/Treatment (Accident)
fields.summary: List medicines/treatment prescribed for the accident.

fields.label: Date of Consultation
fields.summary: Write MM/DD/YYYY of first consult for this illness.

fields.label: Diagnosis of the Attending Physician (Illness)
fields.summary: Write physician’s diagnosis for the illness.

fields.label: Prescribed Medicines/Treatment (Illness)
fields.summary: List medicines/treatment prescribed for the illness.

fields.label: Previous Similar Condition?
fields.summary: If you had this (or similar) condition before, provide brief details.

fields.label: Physician’s Name
fields.summary: Write name of regular physician/family doctor.

fields.label: Other Medical Plans?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, write company name and policy number.

fields.label: Preferred Payout Option
fields.summary: Tick one: • Fund Transfer (fill Bank Account Details) • Check.

fields.label: Type of Joint Account
fields.summary: Tick: • and • and/or (if account is joint).

fields.label: Account Name
fields.summary: Write exact account name (must match policyowner).

fields.label: Co-depositor’s Name (if any)
fields.summary: Write co-depositor’s full name if joint account.

fields.label: Authorization to Obtain/Disclose Information
fields.summary: Sign to authorize Allianz PNB Life to request/receive relevant information for claim processing.

fields.label: Signature of Insured
fields.summary: Insured signs above printed name and dates.

fields.label: Printed Name & Signature of Policyowner
fields.summary: Policyowner signs and dates (if different from insured).

sections.title: Part 2 — Attending Physician’s Statement (if claim > PHP 5,000)

fields.label: Disease Congenital/Hereditary?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide details.

fields.label: Diagnosis (with ICD Code)
fields.summary: Write diagnosis and ICD code, if available.

fields.label: Procedures for Diagnosis
fields.summary: List procedures done to confirm diagnosis.

fields.label: Details of Previous Consultations
fields.summary: List dates and details of prior consultations.

fields.label: Referred by Another Practitioner?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, give name and contact details.

fields.label: Loss/Disability Solely due to Accident?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If No, state contributory causes.

fields.label: Influence of Alcohol/Medication?
fields.summary: Tick Yes/No. If Yes, provide details.
